entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
